chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
l: Ordered.sort Label
nodes: seq nid
this: nid

Goal:
getProtocol W l = gp

Premises:
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
gp = GreeterProtocol nodes l : protocol
nid = nat : Set
Notation seq := list
getProtocol = fun (w : world) (i : Label) => match find i w with | Some p => p | None => EmptyProt i end : world -> Label -> protocol
W = (l \\-> gp, Unit) : world
Label = [ordType of nat] : ordType
getPUn : forall (U W : world) (l : Label), valid (U \+ W) -> l \in dom U.1 -> getProtocol U l = getProtocol (U \+ W) l
Actions.safe_local : forall (W : world) (l : Label) (p : protocol), getProtocol W l = p -> forall s : state, Actions.skip_safe W s -> coh p (getStatelet s l)
Actions.send_action_wrapper : forall (W : world) (p : protocol) (this : nid) (l : Label), getProtocol W l = p -> forall st : send_trans (coh p), st \In snd_trans p -> seq nat -> nid -> Actions.action W (seq nat) this
send_action_wrapper : forall (W : world) (p : protocol) (this : nid) (l : Label), getProtocol W l = p -> forall st : send_trans (coh p), st \In snd_trans p -> seq nat -> nid -> Actions.action W (seq nat) this
get_protocol_hooks : forall (U : world) (K : union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type) (l : Label), valid U -> getProtocol (U \+ (Unit, K)) l = getProtocol U l
Actions.send_act_step_sem : forall (W : world) (p : protocol) (this : nid) (l : Label), getProtocol W l = p -> forall st : send_trans (coh p), st \In snd_trans p -> forall (msg : seq nat) (to : nid) (s1 : state) (S : Actions.send_act_safe W this l st msg to s1) (s2 : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (r : seq nat), Actions.send_act_step S s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2
Ordered.sort = fun t : ordType => let (sort, _) := t in sort : ordType -> Type Ordered.sort is a coercion
Actions.skip_action_wrapper : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (p : protocol), getProtocol W l = p -> forall V : Type, (forall s : state, coh p (getStatelet s l) -> V) -> Actions.action W V this
skip_action_wrapper : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (p : protocol), getProtocol W l = p -> forall V : Type, (forall s : state, coh p (getStatelet s l) -> V) -> Actions.action W V this
Actions.skip_step : forall (W : world) (l : Label) (p : protocol), getProtocol W l = p -> forall V : Type, (forall s : state, coh p (getStatelet s l) -> V) -> forall s1 : state, Actions.skip_safe W s1 -> state -> V -> Prop
Actions.skip_step_sem : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (p : protocol) (pf : getProtocol W l = p) (V : Type) (f : forall s : state, coh p (getStatelet s l) -> V) (s1 : state) (S : Actions.skip_safe W s1) (s2 : state) (r : V), Actions.skip_step pf f S s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2
Actions.skip_step_total : forall (W : world) (l : Label) (p : protocol) (pf : getProtocol W l = p) (V : Type) (f : forall s : state, coh p (getStatelet s l) -> V) (s : state) (S : Actions.skip_safe W s), exists (s' : state) (r : V), Actions.skip_step pf f S s' r
Actions.tryrecv_act_step_sem : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred (seq nat)), (forall (l : Label) (n : nid) (t : nat) (m : seq nat), filter l n t m -> l \in dom W) -> forall s1 : state, Actions.tryrecv_act_safe W s1 -> forall (s2 : state) (r : option (nid * nat * seq nat)), Actions.tryrecv_act_step W this filter s1 s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2
Actions.tryrecv_act_step = fun (W : world) (this : nid) (filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred (seq nat)) (s1 s2 : state) (r : option (nid * nat * seq nat)) => exists pf : s1 \In Coh W, [/\ forall (l : Label) (m : mid) (tms : TaggedMessage) (from : nat) (rt : receive_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol W l))) (b : bool), this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol W l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> Some {| content := tms; from := from; to := this; active := b |} = find m (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) -> rt \In rcv_trans (getProtocol W l) -> tag tms = t_rcv rt -> msg_wf rt (coh_s l pf) this from tms -> filter l from (t_rcv rt) tms ->...-> Prop Arguments Actions.tryrecv_act_step _ _ _%function_scope
Actions.send_act_safe_coh : forall (W : world) (p : protocol) (this : nid) (l : Label) (st : send_trans (coh p)) (msg : seq nat) (to : nid) (s : state), Actions.send_act_safe W this l st msg to s -> Coh W s
prEq : forall p : protocol, getProtocol (mkWorld p) (plab p) = p
tryrecv_action_wrapper : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred (seq nat)), (forall (l : Label) (n : nid) (t : nat) (m : seq nat), filter l n t m -> l \in dom W) -> Actions.action W (option (nid * nat * seq nat)) this
Actions.tryrecv_action_wrapper : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred (seq nat)), (forall (l : Label) (n : nid) (t : nat) (m : seq nat), filter l n t m -> l \in dom W) -> Actions.action W (option (nid * nat * seq nat)) this
GreeterProtocol.GreeterProt = fun (fixed_nodes : seq nid) (l : Label) => Protocol l (GreeterProtocol.GreeterProt_obligation_1 fixed_nodes) (GreeterProtocol.GreeterProt_obligation_2 fixed_nodes) : seq nid -> Label -> protocol Arguments GreeterProtocol.GreeterProt _%seq_scope
Record protocol : Type := Protocol { nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid; plab : Ordered.sort Label; coh : cohpred nodes; snd_trans : seq (send_trans coh); rcv_trans : seq (receive_trans coh); snd_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.snd_tags snd_trans)); rcv_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.rcv_tags rcv_trans)) } Arguments Protocols.Protocol [nodes]%function_scope _ [coh] [snd_trans rcv_trans]%seq_scope
Actions.send_act_step : forall (W : world) (p : protocol) (this : nid) (l : Label) (st : send_trans (coh p)) (msg : seq nat) (to : nid) (s1 : state), Actions.send_act_safe W this l st msg to s1 -> union_mapUMC Label dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop
Actions.send_act_step_total : forall (W : world) (p : protocol) (this : nid) (l : Label) (st : send_trans (coh p)) (msg : seq nat) (to : nid) (s : state) (S : Actions.send_act_safe W this l st msg to s), exists (s' : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (r : seq nat), Actions.send_act_step S s' r
Actions.safe_safe : forall (W : world) (p : protocol) (this : nid) (l : Label) (st : send_trans (coh p)) (msg : seq nat) (to : nid) (s : state), Actions.send_act_safe W this l st msg to s -> send_safe st this to (getStatelet s l) msg
Actions.skip_safe = fun W : world => [eta Coh W] : world -> state -> Prop
Actions.tryrecv_act_safe = fun W : world => (InMem (T:=state))^~ (Mem (Coh W)) : world -> state -> Prop
Actions.skip_safe_coh : forall (W : world) (s1 : state), Actions.skip_safe W s1 -> Coh W s1
Actions.tryrecv_act_safe_coh : forall (W : world) (s : state), Actions.tryrecv_act_safe W s -> Coh W s
network_step_sind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : SProp), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) -> (forall (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 -> forall S : send_safe st this to (getStatelet s1 l) msg, all_hooks_fire w l (t_snd st) s1 this msg to -> Some b = send_step S -> s2 = upd l {| dstate := upd this b (dstate (getStatelet s1 l)); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) {| content := {| tag := t_snd st; tms_cont := msg |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} s1 -> P) ->...-> P
network_step_ind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : Prop), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) -> (forall (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 -> forall S : send_safe st this to (getStatelet s1 l) msg, all_hooks_fire w l (t_snd st) s1 this msg to -> Some b = send_step S -> s2 = upd l {| dstate := upd this b (dstate (getStatelet s1 l)); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) {| content := {| tag := t_snd st; tms_cont := msg |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} s1 -> P) ->...-> P
Inductive network_step (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) : Prop := Idle : s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> network_step w this s1 s2 | SendMsg : forall (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 ->...-> network_step w this s1 s2 Arguments Idle [w] _ [s1 s2] Arguments SendMsg [w this s1 s2 l st] _ [to] [msg]%seq_scope [b] _ _ _ [S] Arguments ReceiveMsg [w this s1 s2 l rt] _ [i] [from]%nat_scope [pf] _ [C msg0]
ReceiveMsg : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label) (rt : receive_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), rt \In get_rt w l -> forall (i : mid) (from : nat) (pf : this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l)), l \in dom s1 -> forall (C : Coh w s1) (msg0 : TaggedMessage), tag msg0 = t_rcv rt -> [/\ find i (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) = Some {| content := msg0; from := from; to := this; active := true |}, msg_wf rt (coh_s l C) this from msg0 & let loc' := receive_step rt from msg0 (coh_s l C) pf in s2 = upd l {| dstate := upd this loc' (dstate (getStatelet s1 l)); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) i |} s1] -> network_step w this s1 s2
Actions.tryrecv_act_step_total : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred (seq nat)) (s : state), Actions.tryrecv_act_safe W s -> exists (s' : state) (r : option (nid * nat * seq nat)), Actions.tryrecv_act_step W this filter s s' r
SendMsg : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 -> forall S : send_safe st this to (getStatelet s1 l) msg, all_hooks_fire w l (t_snd st) s1 this msg to -> Some b = send_step S -> s2 = upd l {| dstate := upd this b (dstate (getStatelet s1 l)); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) {| content := {| tag := t_snd st; tms_cont := msg |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} s1 -> network_step w this s1 s2
Coh = fun (w : world) (s : state) => [/\ valid w, valid s, hook_complete w, dom w.1 =i dom s & forall l : Label, coh (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s l)] : world -> Pred state
all_hooks_fire = fun (h : hooks) (l : Label) (st : nat_ordType) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (n : nid) (msg : seq nat) (to : nid) => forall (z : nat_ordType) (lc : Label) (hk : hook_type), Some hk = find (z, lc, (l, st)) h -> lc \in dom s -> l \in dom s -> hk (getLocal n (getStatelet s lc)) (getLocal n (getStatelet s l)) msg to : hooks -> Label -> nat_ordType -> union_mapUMC Label dstatelet -> nid -> seq nat -> nid -> Prop Arguments all_hooks_fire _ _ _ _ _ _%seq_scope
GreeterProtocol.hello = [:: 3; 1; 1; 0] : seq nat
GreeterProtocol = GreeterProtocol.GreeterProt : seq nid -> Label -> protocol Arguments GreeterProtocol _%seq_scope
GreeterProtocol.nodes = fun fixed_nodes : seq nid => fun=> mem fixed_nodes : seq nid -> dstatelet -> pred nid Arguments GreeterProtocol.nodes _%seq_scope
hook_type = heap -> heap -> seq nat -> nid -> Prop : Type
InductiveInv.ProtocolWithInvariant.II : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (sts : seq (InductiveInv.ProtocolWithInvariant.SendInv p I)) (rts : seq (InductiveInv.ProtocolWithInvariant.ReceiveInv p I)), [seq InductiveInv.ProtocolWithInvariant.st i | i <- sts] = snd_trans p -> [seq InductiveInv.ProtocolWithInvariant.rt i | i <- rts] = rcv_trans p -> InductiveInv.ProtocolWithInvariant.InductiveInv p I

``` 
unfold getProtocol. 
rewrite <- prEq.
apply: prEq. 
Qed.
```

original: unfold getProtocol. rewrite <- prEq. apply: prEq.
